title: Should we raise our hands & say Ameen during Qunoot in Witr & in Qunoot Nazilah? assim al hakeem
transcript: I [Music] asking start also should we after him and should there be any gap between the hands or not so are you asking me about the ruling of saying aan after the am man okay yes are you ask this is this your question what's the ruling on saying after the not that but also the raising the hands it is permissible to raise the hands when the Imam is doing whether in W or in and to Sayan as well the difference is in we don't say this is for we praise Allah we offer salutation upon the prophet and we ask for the destruction of the Jews and the enemies of Islam and the likes and that Allah Avenge avenges the Muslims and uh uh the victims that are being oppressed and Allah Knows Best
